Avewage cycwes pew wawk can be cawcuwated by dividing the count by numbew of wawks.

Counts the numbew of times the machine was unabwe to find a twanswation in the Instwuction Twanswation Wookaside Buffew (ITWB) fow a wineaw addwess of an instwuction fetch.  It counts when new twanswation awe fiwwed into the ITWB.  The event is specuwative in natuwe, but wiww not count twanswations (page wawks) that awe begun and not finished, ow twanswations that awe finished but not fiwwed into the ITWB.
